actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1050.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 3787 to direct the Secretary of the Interior to purchase and hold certain lands in trust for the Zuni Indian Tribe of New Mexico; to confer jurisdiction on the Court of Claims with respect to land claims of such tribe; and to authorize such tribe to purchase and exchange lands in the States of New Mexico and Arizona.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3787 (Zuni Indian Tribe lands).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 3787 to direct the Secretary of the Interior to purchase and hold certain lands in trust for the Zuni Indian Tribe of New Mexico; to confer jurisdiction on the Court of Claims with respect to land claims of such tribe; and to authorize such tribe to purchase and exchange lands in the States of New Mexico and Arizona.
